Interface PairingEngine

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpPairingEngineAdapter, Tn3270PairingEngineAdapter
public interface PairingEngine
Port that pairs protocol message events into request/response groupings.

Implementations are typically stateful per flow and not thread-safe.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<MessagePair>
    accept(MessageEvent event)
    Accepts a message event and, when a counterpart is available, emits a MessagePair.
    default void
    close()
    Releases any resources associated with the pairing engine.

  • Method Details

    • accept

      Optional<MessagePair> accept(MessageEvent event) throws Exception
      Accepts a message event and, when a counterpart is available, emits a MessagePair.
      Parameters:
      event - message event produced by a reconstructor
      Returns:
      paired message when ready; otherwise Optional.empty()
      Throws:
      Exception - if pairing fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • close

      default void close() throws Exception
      Releases any resources associated with the pairing engine.
      Throws:
      Exception - if cleanup fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
